tag_list: entrepreneur, marketing, crowdsource, social, advertising, cloud
overview:
Chris McLellan is the Founder of Friends Electric, a cloud marketing platform and social network.

Chris has previously held product and marketing positions at UK social media company 4D Interactive, UK interactive TV agency YooMedia, US telecoms giant MCI and Canadian digital networking pioneer Newbridge Networks.

Chris is originally from Ottawa, Canada (the ‘silicon valley of the North’) and re-located to London, UK in 1996.

Friends Electric is his first start up business and is set to enter customer trials in October 2010. Chris is also a Partner in digital music business blog and consultantcy The Music Void.
